REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2487 reute r f BC-ARDEN-GROUP-<ARDN>-AM 04-03 0042

TEXT.TITLE: ARDEN GROUP <ARDN> AMENDS CERTIFICATE
TEXT.BODY: Arden Group Inc said stockholders approved the redesignation of its common stock as Class A and the issuance of a new class B common stock. The class B has super-voting rights, it said. Reuter
